txt.en: 'The bats of the Old Forest have been a minor annoyance in the past, but of late they have grown very aggressive and even dangerous. They could become a plague in Buckland, so we need to reduce their numbers before that happens.\n\n'There is a tunnel through the High Hay, east of here.'
'Bats may have their uses but I find the creature foul, disgustin, disease-ridden beasts. There are simply too many too close to Buckland for my taste.'
Hodric Bracegirdle needs your help reducing the threats from the Old Forest.
Defeated bats in the western Old Forest ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Defeat bats in the western Old Forest ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
There is a tunnel into the Old Forest, east of Hodric Bracegirdle.\n\nHodric Bracegirdle has asked you to reduce the number of bats in the Old Forest.
Talk to Hodric Bracegirdle in Buckland
Hodric Bracegirdle can be found near the entrance to the Old Forest near the hole in the High Hay.\n\nHodric awaits word of your success.
